subject: how to transliterate cure, etc.
msgSnippet: While I am working on my dictionary, I am coming across words that I am coming across words in the CURE lexical set which I am not sure how to transliterate.
messageBody:
While I am working on my dictionary, I am coming across words that I am
coming across words in the CURE lexical set which I am not sure how to
transliterate.

_boor_ [bU@r]
_cure_ [kjU@r]

First, there is the issue that American sometimes use a [j] for these
words, and sometimes they don't. For now I assume I should just go with
American pronounciation, sometimes putting a /j/ in the word, and
sometimes not.

Second, how to I transliterate the rest of the word? In the news, they
have been appearing as such:

_boor_ => /bUar/
_cure_ => /cjUar/

Does that look okay?

Paul
